item.title: Save Hook
item.description: Link Golang Workflow on Youtube Shortcuts Keys Function Description , t t run current test , t p run all tests in file , t g f generate tests for exported functions , t g F generate tests for all functions , r r lsp-rename Renames object , h h godoc-at-point K evil-smart-doc-lookup, seems to call godoc-at-point in go-mode Save Hook Running lsp-format-buffer and lsp-organize-imports are two functions that youâ€™ll want to run so often they should be save hooks.
